name: Echo Night
description: Echo Night (エコー ナイト, Ekō Naito) is a mystery adventure video game developed by From Software for the PlayStation. It was released in Japan in 1998, and in North America in 1999. It is the first game in the Echo Night series, following up with the Japan-exclusive Echo Night 2: The Lord of Nightmares in 1999, and Echo Night: Beyond in 2004.
